Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1985...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Mike Davis (BC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1986, off Thomas Prahl (BC)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1986, hitting .299 with 26 HR, 111 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Wisconsin on 5/16/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1987, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...

Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1988, hitting .378 with 8 HR, 24 RBI...
